tasks.label: Import Gemini keys & Run Dev (bash)
tasks.command: node ./scripts/import-keys.js && export $(cat .dev.vars | xargs) && npm run dev

tasks.label: Import Gemini keys & Run Dev (PowerShell)
tasks.command: node ./scripts/import-keys.js; Get-Content .dev.vars | ForEach-Object { if ($_ -match "^([^=]+)=(.*)$") { $n=$matches[1]; $v=$matches[2].Trim("'\""); Set-Item -Path Env:$n -Value $v } }; npm run dev
